sentence: View host/CNN commentator Ana Navarro attended, as well as North Carolina Congressman Madison Cawthorn.
author: Abram Brown
title: Poolside Fundraisers, Crypto And Mini-Trumps: Inside Peter Thiel's Life After Facebook

sentence: Ortagus is also endorsed by Trump and will face music video producer and director Robby Starbuck, who is backed by North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn, in the primary.

sentence: A month ago, McCarthy publicly criticized members Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) and Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) was wrong? for calling Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky a "thug."

sentence: In another instance of that balancing act, Stefanik demurred on Thursday when asked if remarks from one far-right member, Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) describing Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky as a thug? could prove damaging to House Republicans' midterm efforts.
